name: Losing my Marbles (Yrgo_Game_Creator)
description:
Sam has lost her marbles. Someone has thrown them down the drain and now she has to go find them. But there’s something going on down in the sewers. Are rats really supposed to be this big? And who are those other Sams running around snatching Sam's marbles from her? She’s clearly the one wearing red… No, wait purple! Or wasn’t it yellow..?


Losing My Marbles is a turn-based tactical racing game, played on an isometric grid. Be first to gather all the lost marbles before your friends and escape the filthy sewers. Choose your actions carefully, you only get three of them.

  1. Download the APK and install it on your Android device.
  2. Download the exe and boot up the game on your computer.
  3. Choose your player color and enter the game code on your phone.

As you’d expect, there are some wrinkles to iron out, some things to be aware of:

  1. You have to be exactly 4 players
  2. You can only play on Android devices
  3. You have to talk with your friends (awful, we know) to make sure that you don't pick the same color. 


We made this during seven weeks as a student project at Yrgo. It may get quality-of-life updates depending on interest, so if you like the game, please let us know in the comments.
